main.name: João Emmerich
main.description: I am a FullStack Javascript developer and I use NodeJS and React to develop web applications.
main.bio: I was never satisfied with the short answer. Lead by curiosity I found programming when in my own company, Furmidable Family, I took the responsibility of designing our website. Soon the default theme in Wordpress was not enough, I wanted to tweak things and make the website my own. So, I learned HTML and CSS, then PHP and Mysql. And boom! I was caught by programming and couldn't turn back.
